description:
Queen’s unforeseen move stuns everyone on the Performance Floor. And then, he goes on to utilize another special technique which can break every bone in Sanji’s body. On the verge of a crisis, Sanji feels something strange again.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le trouble de Sanji. Coup d`arrêt pour les ailes !
Sanji no Ihen: Ryouyoku Kiiro Shingou!
Sanji`s Mutation - The Two Arms in Crisis!
Sanjis Veränderung – Die Hände des Kapitäns in der Bredouille!
サンジの異変 両翼黄色信号!
